Reviews.Title: Great Camera for a small price
Reviews.Author: Fred
Reviews.Content: I shoot all my shorts with it and it looks awesome. I recommend using an external sound recording device with a boom pole and a shotgun mic though. The sound on this is not really good and you can hear the hand manipulating it.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Value for the $
Reviews.Author: alan lebair
Reviews.Content: The Canon T3I with 18 MP is everything I needed in a digital SLR for an advanced amateur photographer. The camera takes great photos and uses my existing Canon lenses.

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera!
Reviews.Author: 2ParrotMom
Reviews.Content: I updated from the t3 to the T3i. love the articulating screen and more features than the T3 offered. This with the 50mm F1/4 lens and I am cranking out some decent shots from food to babies.

Reviews.Title: Good Stuff
Reviews.Author: The Reviewer
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera and takes good pictures. It is user friendly and has a lot of settings making it fun to use. Sometimes the auto-focus is slow or has a hard time getting perfectly focused. Overall, I like it a lot and don't have any major complaints.
